text: In the leadup to the next Australian federal election, a number of polling companies have been conducting regular opinion polls for various news organisations. These polls collected data on parties' primary vote, and contained an estimation of the two-party-preferred vote. They also asked questions about the electorate's views on major party leaders. ==Graphical summary== ==Voting intention== ===Poll results=== {| class="toccolours" cellpadding="6" cellspacing="0" style="text-align:center; margin-right:.4em; margin-top:.4em; font-size:90%;" |- !
